Home.home_quote: My imaginary friend used to play with the kid across the street.

About.title: About
About.about_content_1: My name is Erik, and I am a curious and focused individual currently learning front-end development through KodeHode. I enjoy working in the IT field and find design and functionality fascinating. In my personal life, I am a Jack of All Trades, engaging in various activities such as music, photography, gaming, dog ownership, and mechanical work on cars, among others.
About.about_content_2: I have knowledge across multiple fields, but primarily, I have worked extensively with HTML, CSS, Photoshop, and web design. I have also worked with Wordpress to a considerable extent.
About.about_title_3: WHERE do I want to go
About.about_content_3: In the future, I envision myself working with design and functionality in the context of website or application development. I also aim to enhance my back-end skills with the intention of becoming a full-stack developer.
